akn:section.akn:heading: State plans for child welfare services

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Joint development In order to be eligible for payment under this subpart, a State must have a plan for child welfare services which has been developed jointly by the Secretary and the State agency designated pursuant to subsection (b)(1), and which meets the requirements of subsection (b).
